name: mental-herb
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is attracted, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.
short_effect: Held: Consumed to cure infatuation. Gen V: Also removes Taunt, Encore, Torment, Disable, and Cursed Body.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.
